LuaAPI
public static
LuaAPI

A static class for executing Lua commands with Unity. Any functions within the class are automatically registered with the Lua environment, unless marked with the [LuaAPIHidden] attribute.

Functions
Command
[LuaAPIHidden]
public static IEnumerator Command(
Script luaScript,
string functionName,
params object[] args
)

Executes a Lua function as coroutine, allowing it to be seamlessly nested inside of Unity coroutines.

Parameters
luaScript
Script

The Lua Script object where the function is defined.

functionName
string

The name of the Lua function to be executed as a coroutine.

args
params object[]

An optional array of arguments to be passed to the Lua function.

Returns

An IEnumerator that can be used in Unity coroutines to execute the Lua coroutine, and in turn any Unity or Lua coroutines it calls.

Notes

This function is marked with the [LuaAPIHidden] attribute to prevent it from being called directly from Lua.
